tool_description: HMMER's hmm_search tool is used to search for sequence homologs of a query protein domain model within a sequence database. It utilizes Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) for identifying domains and sequences with similar structural and functional motifs.

required_parameters.name: annotated_domains
required_parameters.description: A set of protein sequences with known domain annotations to be used as query models for the search.

required_parameters.name: unannotated_database
required_parameters.description: A database of protein sequences without domain annotations, which will be searched for homologous domains using the query models.

optional_parameters.name: domE
optional_parameters.description: The E-value threshold for domain-level reporting. Domains with an E-value above this threshold will not be reported.

return_values.name: hot_domains
return_values.description: A list of sequences from the database that show significant matches to the query domain models, indicating potential homologous domains.
